snippet.name: Create spatial index
snippet.code: CREATE INDEX states_idx ON demo_states(geom) INDEXTYPE IS MDSYS.SPATIAL_INDEX;

snippet.name: Validate using tolerance
snippet.code: SELECT s.state, SDO_GEOM.VALIDATE_GEOMETRY_WITH_CONTEXT(s.geom, 0.005) FROM demo_states s WHERE s.state = 'California';

snippet.name: Calculate MBR
snippet.code: SELECT SDO_GEOM.SDO_MBR(s.geom, m.diminfo) FROM demo_states s, user_sdo_geom_metadata m WHERE m.table_name = 'DEMO_STATES' AND m.column_name = 'GEOM' AND s.state = 'California';
